review: We have been able to watch a plethora of movies without charge through Amazon Prime, as well as other movies with a small rental fee. We are very satisfied.
author: Sally L. Heathcoat "chasgirl"

review: Hate it. Mine is in German and I can't read what to do to change language

review: I purchase one, then another for both my parents and my father-in-law.  They love it because it is easy to use and they get access to a lot of programs commercial free.
author: E Kinion

review: Let's me watch when I want to wish
author: janet snapp

review: I just picked this up to replace an original roku that was continually freezing.  The set up was super easy and I didn't mind having to plug it in (my roku had to be plugged in). The usb cord was long enough and I keep my tv on a tall dresser.  The only reason I am docking a star since the operating system is fast and set up was a breeze is that if you have Comcast and HBO, HBO Go will not work. Wish I would of known this prior to purchase but I can still view on my XBOX One so not a game changer.***update***I have dropped this down to one stars. Hulu plus stopped working as well as the issue with HBO go. I called and they confirmed it is a big issue they have had for a while. The product at this point became nearly useless to me and I returned for a chromecast which I live and all apps work
author: Jesse R
